subject: Video testimonials from NPTEL fee waiver beneficiaries
snippet: Dear Students, As you are the beneficiary of NPTEL fee waiver, we want your Video testimonials as NPTEL fee waiver beneficiaries. NPTEL will share this with Sponsor and you will continue to get it in
content:
Dear Students,
As you are the beneficiary of NPTEL fee waiver, we want your Video
testimonials as NPTEL fee waiver beneficiaries.
NPTEL will share this with Sponsor and you will continue to get it in
future as well.
*Your video testimonials will be then available on NPTEL IIT website as
well.*

*Points to consider:*
*Your background, your remote location (originally from village), due to
financial support you are motivated and got opportunity to score and be
topper of the NPTEL course. Thanks to NPTEL and team to sponsor/fee waiver.*

*Kindly send as a reply to this mail only by tomorrow. *

-- 
*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

--

subject: Regarding Software Group Project definition
snippet: Dear Sir, I hope this email finds you well. As per our discussion in today's SGP lab, you suggested we should consider the Alumni System for our project from the sorted list of projects. You also
content:
Dear Sir,

I hope this email finds you well. As per our discussion in today's SGP lab,
you suggested we should consider the Alumni System for our project from the
sorted list of projects.

You also mentioned that we have one week to explore and propose any other
potential topics. We will work on this and finalize the definition in our
next lab.

Thank you for your guidance.

Best regards,
Ravi Rathod D23CE172
Anand J Chaniyara D23CE186


-- Thanks & Regards
-----------------------------------
Ravi Rathod,
D23CE172 Student,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology, CHARUSAT

subject: Thank you for taking the pledge on 'Say Yes to Life, No to Drugs'
snippet: Dear Fellow Citizen, Thank you for taking the pledge on 'Say Yes to Life, No to Drugs' MyGov acknowledges your commitment towards joining the fight against Drug abuse and Trafficking.The
content:
Dear Fellow Citizen,

                                  Thank you for taking the pledge on 'Say Yes to Life, No to Drugs'

                                  MyGov acknowledges your commitment towards joining the fight against Drug abuse and Trafficking.

                                  The attached Certificate of Commitment appreciates your contribution towards creating awareness about the ill effects of drug abuse.

                                  With regards,
                                  MyGov Team

subject: Re: URGENT & IMP: NPTEL Fee waiver/scholarship selection process - Jan-June 2024 semester
snippet: Final Reminder !!! If your family income falls under 2 lakh in such a case, get the benefit of the fee waiver in the NPTEL exam. please submit income proof and do entry before 2:00 PM today. On Fri,
content:
*Final Reminder !!!*
*If your family income falls under 2 lakh in such a case, get the benefit
of the fee waiver in the NPTEL exam. *

*please submit income proof and do entry before 2:00 PM today.*

On Fri, May 31, 2024 at 9:46 AM Ronak R Patel <ronakrpatel.ce@charusat.ac.in>
wrote:

> Dear All,
>
> The fee waiver selection process is open now for the  Jan-June 2024
> * semester.*
>
> *IMP Points*
>
>    - Family income below 2 lakh (No other proof will be valid except
>    family income proof).
>
> *Submit a hard copy of income proof to me next week, and do the entry in
> the attached Google Sheet.*
>
> *If you can't send me a hard copy, send me a soft copy in reply to this
> email only.*
>
> *Link To Add Your Details: Click Here

subject: WIPRO Dice ID Certification 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗻𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽 𝗙𝗼𝗿 CHARUSAT 𝗦𝘁𝘂𝗱𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 [𝗠𝗔𝗡𝗗𝗔𝗧𝗢𝗥𝗬 𝗜𝗡𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗡𝗦𝗛𝗜𝗣]
snippet: Dear Students of CHARUSAT (ALL DEPARTMENTS 1st to 4th year) [ MANDATORY INTERNSHIP ] Greetings! We are pleased to share with you that our company, TEACHNOOK, is collaborating with Cognizance (IIT
content:
*Dear Students of * *CHARUSAT*
*(ALL  DEPARTMENTS 1st to 4th year**)*
*[ MANDATORY INTERNSHIP ]*

Greetings!

We are pleased to share with you that our company, TEACHNOOK, is
collaborating with Cognizance (IIT Roorkee) to offer a unique 2-month
Training + Internship  Program. This advanced program will provide you with
the missing practical skills that you need to enhance your career.

 We are enrolling only *LIMITED STUDENTS *in the program for *CHARUSAT**.*

*To know more information join in whatsapp group:*

*https://chat.whatsapp.com/GoB39BYWJ5A7fpBJlti0NG
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/GoB39BYWJ5A7fpBJlti0NG>*


*It is Mandatory for students to fill out the form, if you get shortlisted
you will be getting a call from our HR Team:*
https://forms.gle/wXeFXk2pcBC9rXx86


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*
*First month*: IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)
*No Prerequisites Required.*


*Second month*: Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will be giving students experience
in solving real-world problems.

Project 1:- 10 individual projects assigned to each intern which they have
to complete with their mentor .

Project 2:-  Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a
group of 15 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to
them they have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

Here are two types of Classes we are providing:

1. Blended Program/Recorded classes: You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear it in live doubt clearing sessions
which will be organized every weekend.

2. Mentor led/Live classes: You will be having live zoom classes at 6:30PM
 for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
LMS(Learning Management System) portal where you will have access to it for
6 months.

After Completion of the program the student shall receive a:

✅ Program completion certificate issued by  Cognizance (IIT Roorkee) and
Verified By Wipro DICE ID.
✅ Co-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs.
✅ 100% Placement Assistance.
✅ Access to a growing community.

*Congratulations! To Already registered** students*, You've taken the first
step towards a brighter future. Don't miss out on this chance to take your
career to the next level. Spread the word to your friends and classmates so
they can benefit too!

subject: Re: Invitation to Virtual Labs & Internship opportunities Orientation Webinar in association with IIT Kanpur
snippet: Dear Students, Following are the zoom Webinar Details: You are invited to a Zoom webinar. When: Apr 5, 2024 07:00 PM India Topic: "Virtual Labs & Internship Opportunities" in
content:
Dear Students,
Following are the zoom Webinar Details:

You are invited to a Zoom webinar.
When: Apr 5, 2024 07:00 PM India
Topic: "
*Virtual Labs & Internship Opportunities" in collaboration with IIT-Kanpur*
Please click the link below to join the webinar:

*https://us06web.zoom.us/j/84503305377?pwd=cK4Plymm9tBhJzeN6Vd9AycDOURaKQ.ll-Y6Vx1eEqzN50V*
<https://us06web.zoom.us/j/84503305377?pwd=cK4Plymm9tBhJzeN6Vd9AycDOURaKQ.ll-Y6Vx1eEqzN50V>

Passcode: 272585


On Wed, Apr 3, 2024 at 5:01 PM Amit Thakkar <amitthakkar.it@charusat.ac.in>
wrote:

> Dear Students,
>
> We are excited to extend an invitation to you for an enlightening Virtual
> Labs Orientation Session hosted by the esteemed *Indian Institute of
> Technology Kanpur (IIT Kanpur).* This session aims to introduce you to
> the myriad benefits and opportunities that Virtual Labs offer in your
> academic journey and *Internship opportunities at IIT Kanpur.*
>
> *Date*: 5th April, 2024
>
>
> *Time*: 07:00 pm onwards
>
>
> *Platform*: Zoom (Link will be provided to registered candidates through
> email.)
>
>
> *Guest Lecturer*: *Mrs. Suman Triphathi (Senior Project Associate,
> Virtual Labs, IIT Kanpur)*
>
>
>
>
> *Agenda:*
>
> ·        Introduction to Virtual Labs and their significance in
> engineering education.
>
> ·        Live demonstration of various virtual experiments.
>
> ·        *Internship opportunity at IIT Kanpur*
>
> ·        Guidance on navigating and utilizing the Virtual Labs platform
> effectively.
>
> ·        Q&A session to address any queries or concerns.
>
> *Importance of Virtual Labs:*
>
> Virtual Labs offer hands-on experience to the Engineering enthusiast,
> bridging the gap between theory and application. Regardless of your
> location or access to lab facilities, you can engage in practical
> experiments and reinforce theoretical knowledge.
>
> By participating, you'll gain insight into how Virtual Labs enhance your
> learning experience, empower remote experimentation, and strengthen
> practical skills. Don't miss this opportunity to explore the vast potential
> of Virtual Labs in your academic journey.
>
> *Click here <https://forms.gle/FDLettuzoNuPt1Ds5>* to register yourself
> for the above session. Registration is mandatory for the students.
>
> We look forward to your active participation and meaningful engagement in
> the Virtual Labs Orientation Session.
> [image: VL_IITK.jpg]
>
>
> With Regards,
>
> Amit Thakkar, Ph.D.
> Professor & Head
> Department of Computer Science & Engineering
> Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology (CSPIT)
> Charotar University of Science & Technology.(CHARUSAT)
> Jay Swaminarayan.
>


-- 
Abhishek Patel

Assistant Professor

Department of Computer Science & Engineering | CSPIT | CHARUSAT

Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC
[image: mobilePhone] +91 9099056918 <+91+9099056918>
[image: emailAddress] abhishekpatel.cse@charusat.ac.in
<abhishekpatel.cse@charusat.ac.ion>
[image: address] Charotar University of Science and Technology

--

subject: FINAL CALL FOR MICROSOFT AND OTHER MNCs TRAINING AND INTERNSHIP DRIVE
snippet: HELLO CHARUSAT STUDENTS, As our exclusive campaign draws to a close after an engaging week on your campus, today marks the final day to seize the opportunity offered by our Scholarship Campaign. Corizo
content:
*HELLO CHARUSAT **STUDENTS,*
[image: MCF.jpg]

*As our exclusive campaign draws to a close after an engaging week on your
campus, today marks the final day to seize the opportunity offered by our
Scholarship Campaign.*
*Corizo proudly collaborates with top-tier multinational corporations such
as **Microsoft,**IBM,Deloitte,Cognizant, and many more to present a
distinctive Training and Internship program across multiple domains. Our
comprehensive 2-month online program, led by industry stalwarts with over a
decade of experience, awaits your participation.*

*Register Here:- **https://forms.gle/eeNEeGEL1wjEM3yy6
<https://forms.gle/eeNEeGEL1wjEM3yy6>*

*FOR MORE DETAILS JOIN THIS GROUP
LINK:-https://chat.whatsapp.com/EFLS8BOjk5n7qiaRpWVbyi
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/EFLS8BOjk5n7qiaRpWVbyi>*

*Program Highlights:*
*⬛ **1st Month (Learning/ Training)*
*Theoretical learning facilitated by Industry Experts.*
*Live interactive sessions fostering engagement and knowledge transfer.*
*Personalized doubt-clearing sessions (One-on-one).*
*Weekly 4-5 sessions via Zoom or Google Meet.*

*⬛ **2nd Month (Project / Internship)*
*Practical application of concepts acquired in the first month.*
*Real-time projects with dedicated mentorship for crafting an impactful
resume.*
*Individual Minor Project [07 days].*
*Group Major Project [21 days].*

*⬛**3rd Month (Placement Assistance)*
*Holistic placement support including Mock Interviews, Group Discussions,
Resume Building, and Personality Development sessions.*

*⬛ **Benefits of Corizo's Program:*
*▪️Training completion certificate co-branded with ISO and WIPRO Approval.*
*▪️**Internship Completion Certificates from esteemed MNCs.*
*▪️**Recognition for Outstanding Performance.*
*▪️**Letter Of Recommendation from MNCs for future job prospects.*
*▪️**Real-world industrial projects to bolster your Resume/CV.*
*▪️**Tailored placement assistance.*
*▪️**Mentorship under industry veterans from reputed organizations like
TCS, IBM, Microsoft, Accenture, and more.*


*We firmly believe that investing in these courses directly shapes a better
career**▪️**trajectory. We encourage you to explore and register for these
transformative courses. For insight, you can peruse reviews of our courses
on Google.*

*Best regards,*
*Corizo Company Team*


*PRITHVIRAJ*

*Senior Manager*

*Corizo*

*6366930305*

*prithviraj@corizo.info* <prithviraj@corizo.info>

*www.corizo.in* <https://www.corizo.in/>

*5th floor, VMF2+7FJ Classic Arena, Hosur Rd, AECS Layout - A Block,
Singasandra, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560068*

>

> that I was unable to attend today's MATLAB lecture due to a scheduling
> conflict with my lectures on Design and Analysis of Algorithms (DAA), which
> also took place during the same time slot.
>
> I sincerely apologize for my absence. In order to catch up on the missed
> content and ensure that I remain on track with the course, I kindly request
> access to the recording of today's MATLAB lecture, if available.
>
> Thank you for your attention to this request.
>
> Best regards,
> Anand J Chaniyara
> D23CE186
>


--

subject: Regarding GATE Classes
snippet: Hello Mates, Thank you for expressing your interest and completing the registration process. This mail is to inform you that we are conducting our first class of GATE series. This class will include
content:
Hello Mates,
Thank you for expressing your interest and completing the registration
process.

This mail is to inform you that we are conducting our first class of GATE
series.
This class will include the concept of :
1. Database Management System
2. General Aptitude

*This class will be held on 2 March, 2024 Saturday, at 9:00 am to 12:00 pm
in 628-B lab.*

*NOTE : Please bring a notebook and pen along with you.*

*Join this Whatsapp Group for regular updates-*

*GATE CLASSES (CSPIT - CE)
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/LsExRCF1gmwLTm0uQ0GyHx>*

subject: Lecture for EE287 MATLAB Programming on 17th February 2024
snippet: Dear Students, This is to inform you that the lecture for EE287 MATLAB Programming is scheduled for 17th February 2024. Please take note of the following details: Date: 17th February Time: 12:00 noon
content:
Dear Students,

This is to inform you that the lecture for EE287 MATLAB Programming is
scheduled for 17th February 2024. Please take note of the following details:



*Date: 17th FebruaryTime: 12:00 noon to 02:00 pmMode: Online (MS Teams)*

Please ensure that you have installed MATLAB on your system before the
lecture to facilitate active participation and engagement with the course
material.

If you encounter any issues or have any questions regarding the lecture or
MATLAB installation, please feel free to reach out to me.

Looking forward to your active participation in the upcoming session.

Best regards,
Prof. Mihir Mehta
-- 
*MIHIR SIDDHARTH MEHTA*

*M & V PATEL Department of Electrical Engineering*
*C S Patel Institute of Technology*
*Charusat University*

*Mobile : +91 740 58 56 957 *

Domain Certification

Domain Certification helps learners to gain expertise in a specific
Area/Domain.

This can be helpful for learners who wish to work in a particular area as
part of their job or research or for those appearing for some
competitive exam or becoming job ready or specialising in an area of
study.



Every domain will comprise Core courses and Elective courses. Once a
learner completes the requisite courses per the mentioned criteria, you
will receive a Domain Certificate showcasing your scores and the domain of
expertise.

Kindly refer to the following link for the list of courses available under
each domain: https://nptel.ac.in/domains/discipline

[image: image.png]

*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

subject: 𝗠𝗡𝗖'𝘀 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗻𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽 𝗙𝗼𝗿 CHARUSAT 𝗦𝘁𝘂𝗱𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 [FINAL REMAINDER 𝗠𝗔𝗡𝗗𝗔𝗧𝗢𝗥𝗬 𝗜𝗡𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗡𝗦𝗛𝗜𝗣]
snippet: Dear Students Of CHARUSAT , (ALL DEPARTMENTS 1st to 4th year) [ MANDATORY FINAL REMINDER ] Greetings from Teachnook! Teachnook in collaboration with WISSENAIRE IIT BHUBANESWAR and IIT BOMBAY E-CELL is
content:
*Dear Students Of CHARUSAT* *,*
*(ALL  DEPARTMENTS 1st to 4th year**)*
*[ MANDATORY FINAL REMINDER ]*

Greetings from Teachnook!

Teachnook in collaboration with *WISSENAIRE IIT BHUBANESWAR and IIT BOMBAY
E-CELL *is organizing a 2 Months of Training + Internship program. We are
enrolling only *LIMITED STUDENTS *in the program for *CHARUSAT* *.*


*It is Mandatory for students to fill out the form, if you get shortlisted
you will be getting a call from our HR Team:*
https://forms.gle/NF1cgFGe5ohF5LtV9


*To know more information join in whatsapp group:*


*https://chat.whatsapp.com/K1tUUlWzbfvCQQJ14oFQdq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K1tUUlWzbfvCQQJ14oFQdq>*


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*
*First month*: IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)
*No Prerequisites Required.*


*Second month*: Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will be giving students experience
in solving real-world problems.

Project 1:- 10 individual projects assigned to each intern which they have
to complete with their mentor .

Project 2:-  Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a group of
15 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them they
have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

Here are two types of Classes we are providing:

1. Blended Program/Recorded classes: You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear it in live doubt clearing sessions
which will be organized every weekend.

2. Mentor led/Live classes: You will be having live zoom classes at 6:30PM
 for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
LMS(Learning Management System) portal where you will have access to it for
6 months.

After Completion of the program the student shall receive a:

✅ Program completion certificate issued by IIT Bhubaneswar (Wissenaire).
✅ Co-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs.
✅ 100% Placement Assistance.
✅ Access to a growing community.

Congratulations to students who already got selected for this internship

subject: Re: A Talk on Generative AI :: ACM- Eminent Speaker Program
snippet: Dear students, Greetings!! Thank you for confirming your registration for the expert talk. I would like to remind you about the expert talk scheduled on "Leveraging Generative AI for Programming
content:
Dear students,



Greetings!!




Thank you for confirming your registration for the expert talk. I would
like to remind you about the expert talk scheduled on  *"**Leveraging
Generative AI for Programming**"*   on 02/02/24, 12 pm onwards. We are
excited about this opportunity for you to gain valuable insights from our
esteemed guest speaker.


Please find details below:

*Speaker:* Dr. Viraj Kumar Professor at Divecha Centre for Climate Change,
IISc, Bangalore.
*Date:* 2nd Feb, 2024
*Time:* 12:10 pm to 01:10 pm

snippet: Dear Students Of CHARUSAT , (ALL DEPARTMENTS 1st to 4th year) [ MANDATORY FINAL REMINDER ] Greetings from Teachnook! Teachnook in collaboration with WISSENAIRE IIT BHUBANESWAR and IIT BOMBAY E-CELL is
content:
*Dear Students Of CHARUSAT* *,*
*(ALL  DEPARTMENTS 1st to 4th year**)*
*[ MANDATORY FINAL REMINDER ]*

Greetings from Teachnook!

Teachnook in collaboration with *WISSENAIRE IIT BHUBANESWAR and IIT BOMBAY
E-CELL *is organizing a 2 Months of Training + Internship program. We are
enrolling only *LIMITED STUDENTS *in the program for *CHARUSAT* *.*


*It is Mandatory for students to fill out the form, if you get shortlisted
you will be getting a call from our HR Team:*
https://forms.gle/NF1cgFGe5ohF5LtV9


*To know more information join in whatsapp group:*


*https://chat.whatsapp.com/K1tUUlWzbfvCQQJ14oFQdq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K1tUUlWzbfvCQQJ14oFQdq>*


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*
*First month*: IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)
*No Prerequisites Required.*


*Second month*: Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will be giving students experience
in solving real-world problems.

Project 1:- 10 individual projects assigned to each intern which they have
to complete with their mentor .

Project 2:-  Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a group of
15 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them they
have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

Here are two types of Classes we are providing:

1. Blended Program/Recorded classes: You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear it in live doubt clearing sessions
which will be organized every weekend.

2. Mentor led/Live classes: You will be having live zoom classes at 6:30PM
 for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
LMS(Learning Management System) portal where you will have access to it for
6 months.

After Completion of the program the student shall receive a:

✅ Program completion certificate issued by IIT Bhubaneswar (Wissenaire).
✅ Co-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs.
✅ 100% Placement Assistance.
✅ Access to a growing community.

Congratulations to students who already got selected for this internship

subject: Opportunities: Joining the SSIP Project for Guided Mentorship
snippet: Dear all, There is an opportunity to work on the project "IoT-Blockchain based Water Quality Monitoring". The project has received the funding from the SSIP 2.0 to develop a prototype model
content:
Dear all,

There is an opportunity to work on the project "IoT-Blockchain based Water
Quality Monitoring".

The project has received the funding from the SSIP 2.0 to develop a
prototype model in the first phase and complete development in the second
phase.
Following are the team members details.

1. 20CE044 - Padmanabh Khunt, intern at Evoort Solutions
2. 20EC023 - Nilay Jadav, intern at ISRO.
3. Martin Parmar

Interested students can apply through google form:

*https://forms.gle/t2K4J6uGYp9E2DEHA* <https://forms.gle/t2K4J6uGYp9E2DEHA>


*Requirements:*

1. Having knowledge of IoT, Sensor and integration - 02 students
2. Having knowledge of frontend & backend (Any frontend with node js) - 02
students

Final selection will be based on the interaction.

After selection, you need to work under the guidance of Padmanabh and Nilay.
There will be weekly meetings to review the assigned work.

*Outcomes:*
1. Students will get fundamental and advanced concepts of IOT
2. Students will get guidance and support to build the application which
integrates hardware and software.
3. Students will be a part of a startup project in the next phase.


Form will be closed tomorrow.

*Expecting strong programming skills and a passion for learning and
exploration*

Thanks.
-- 

*Martin K Parmar,*

Assistant Professor,
U & PU. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT),

At. & Post Changa-388421, Ta: Petlad, Dist:Anand, (Gujarat) India.

https://www.linkedin.com/in/martinparmar/

Mob: +91 8488065457

subject: Re: Regarding Elective Course Enrollment on E - Governance
snippet: Dear Anand, status change to submitted after the new semester begins. On Thu, Dec 7, 2023 at 1:11 PM Anand Chaniyara <d23ce186@charusat.edu.in> wrote: Dear Professor, I trust this email finds you
content:
Dear Anand,

status change to submitted after the new semester begins.

On Thu, Dec 7, 2023 at 1:11 PM Anand Chaniyara <d23ce186@charusat.edu.in>
wrote:

> Dear Professor,
>
> I trust this email finds you well. My name is Anand Chaniyara (D23CE186),
> and I am a second-year student majoring in Computer Engineering. I am
> writing to bring to your attention an issue I have encountered while
> attempting to enroll in the MATLAB Programming elective course for the
> upcoming semester.
>
> Despite making multiple attempts to fill out the enrollment form, the
> system consistently displays my status as "In Progress." I am uncertain
> whether this is a normal occurrence for all students or if it is an issue
> specific to my enrollment. I have reviewed the process thoroughly, but
> unfortunately, I have been unable to complete the enrollment successfully.
>
> If this is a standard part of the enrollment process and my status will be
> updated in due course, I apologize for any inconvenience caused. However,
> if my case is an exception, I kindly request your guidance on the necessary
> steps to ensure my enrollment is completed successfully.
>
> Thank you for your time and consideration. I am looking forward to your
> guidance on this matter.
>
> Best regards,
>
> Anand J  Chaniyara
> D23CE186
> +91 97731 62772
>

subject: Fwd: Registration Form of Endowment Chair Activity of CE-CSPIT (Expert: Dr. Aditya Nigam, IIT Mandi)
snippet: Dear Students, You have shown the interest for this activity. To discuss further we will meet on Monday (9th Oct 2023) at 11.45 AM in 621. Your presence is highly appreciated. ---------- Forwarded
content:
Dear Students,

You have shown the interest for this activity. To discuss further we will
meet on Monday (9th Oct 2023) at 11.45 AM in 621. Your presence is highly
appreciated.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Ronak Patel <ronakpatel.ce@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Sep 14, 2023 at 1:12 PM
Subject: Registration Form of Endowment Chair Activity of CE-CSPIT (Expert:
Dr. Aditya Nigam, IIT Mandi)
To: <20ce@charusat.edu.in>, <21ce@charusat.edu.in>
Cc: Mrugendra Rahevar <mrugendrarahevar.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Nikita Bhatt <
nikitabhatt.ce@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Students,

The prominent teacher from *IIT Mandi, Dr. Aditya Nigam sir*, is going to
visit CHARUSAT from *18th December to 22nd December 2023*. He has vast
experience in Machine Learning and Deep Learning subjects. He has published
many research papers in well known conferences and Journals. He has also
completed many projects in this field. His lecture videos on ML/DL subjects
helped so many enthusiastic people to start career in the domain. You will
also get the chance to interact with sir and to present your work. By
attending this 5 days session, you get more knowledge in ML/DL which helps
you to build a career in ML/DL.

So, register for this session if you are interested.
Due to limited seats, register as soon as possible.

*Registration Link: https://forms.gle/uWsxCKaNaFf3mDJo6
<https://forms.gle/uWsxCKaNaFf3mDJo6>*

Thank You
Ronak N. Patel
Assistant Professor, Representative-Career Development and Placement Cell

subject: Re: 2023-24-ODD SEM-Internal Exam-1 Schedule
snippet: Dear Students, Please follow the seating arrangement for maths exam (7/10/2023): 621: 22CE001 - 22CE047 622: 22CE048 - 22CE095 623: 22CE96 - 22CE140, D23CE141 624: D23CE142- D23CE190 Seating
content:
Dear Students,
Please follow the *seating arrangement for maths exam (7/10/2023)*:

621: 22CE001 - 22CE047
622: 22CE048 - 22CE095
623: 22CE96 - 22CE140, D23CE141
624: D23CE142- D23CE190

Seating arrangement for* D2D internal exam* and* supplementary internal
exam* is *Exam Hall-2, Second floor,CMPICA *building. Seat numbers are
attached with this email.
*Important Instructions for **D2D internal exam and supplementary internal
exam:*

1. You need to sit at the allocated seat number of the exam hall (remember
it well).
2.  You have to be at your allocated seat before 15 mins of your exam time.
Late entries are not allowed.
3. You have to maintain silence in the CMPICA building and exam hall.
Otherwise disciplinary action will be taken.
4. After completing the exam, remember to put the styler pan back
without fail.

On Sat, Sep 30, 2023 at 11:55 AM Vaishali Koria <
vaishalimewada.ce@charusat.ac.in> wrote:

> Dear All,
> Please find the attached schedule of D2D internal exam and
> supplementary internal exam(for those who were not eligible or absent in
> the first internal exam).
> Exam will be on tablets.
> Seating arrangements will be communicated soon.
>
>
> On Thu, Sep 14, 2023 at 11:52 AM Vaishali Koria <
> vaishalimewada.ce@charusat.ac.in> wrote:
>

>> Please find the result of Internal exam-1.

subject: Prominent Alumni Talk Confirmation
snippet: Dear all, Hope this email finds you well. We are happy to invite all registered participants for Prominent Alumni Talk tomorrow 28th September, 2023. The session will begin at 1:00 pm sharp at Seminar
content:
Dear all,

Hope this email finds you well.

We are happy to invite all registered participants for Prominent Alumni
Talk tomorrow 28th September, 2023. The session will begin at 1:00 pm sharp
at Seminar Hall - AIML Department, 2nd Floor - A6 Building, CSPIT, FTE,
CHARUSAT. .

Please find the below details for the session.

*1.     **Welcome and Introduction*

ü  Greet the attendees, introduce the purpose and significance of the
event, and express gratitude for their participation.

ü  Provide a brief outline of the event's agenda and what attendees can
expect.

*2.     **Alumni Talk on Civil Services (UPSC and GPSC)*

ü  The alumni speaker shares their experiences, challenges, and insights
related to preparing for and serving in the civil services, covering both
UPSC (Union Public Service Commission) and GPSC (Gujarat Public Service
Commission).

ü  The speaker discusses their journey, success stories, and offers
valuable tips and strategies for aspirants.

*3.     **Question/Answer Session*

ü  Invite attendees to ask questions related to civil services preparation,
exams, career prospects, etc.

ü  The alumni speaker responds to the questions, providing valuable
insights and guidance to the attendees.

*4.     **Concluding Remarks*

ü  Thank the alumni speaker, attendees and volunteers for their
contributions and participation.

ü  Event Closure: National Anthem
We request you all to occupy seats at 12:45 pm.

Thank you.
-- 

*Martin K Parmar,*

Assistant Professor,
U & PU. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT),

At. & Post Changa-388421, Ta: Petlad, Dist:Anand, (Gujarat) India.

https://www.linkedin.com/in/martinparmar/

Mob: +91 8488065457

--

We are excited to launch our second event under Cyber Security club that
invites you to attend as per the below schedule.

Date: Saturday 30th September, 2023
Time: 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM

subject: Prominent Alumni Talk Series -- CSPIT, FTE, CHARUSAT
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings!! As part of our ongoing efforts to enhance academic and professional growth, we are excited to announce a Prominent Alumni Talk Series of CSPIT, FTE, CHARUSAT. The following
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings!!

As part of our ongoing efforts to enhance academic and professional growth,
we are excited to announce a* Prominent Alumni Talk Series *of CSPIT, FTE,
CHARUSAT*.*

The following are the envisioned benefits of the Prominent Alumni Talk
series:

·       Career Guidance and Development

·    Enhancement in Placement Activities

·       Networking Opportunities

·       Building Alumni-Student Relations

·       Enhanced Alumni Engagement

·       Showcasing Success Stories

The first distinguished speaker for this series is *Mr. Vishvadeepsinh
Gohil,* who will deliver a talk on "*Awareness & Career Opportunities in
GPSC*”.  *Mr. Vishvadeepsinh Gohil*  is an esteemed alumni of U & P U.
Patel Department of Computer Engineering having the role of *Assistant
Commissioner, Government of Gujarat*.

You may please find further details of Mr. Gohil in the attachment.

The event details are as follows:

•          *Day & Date*: Thursday, September 28, 2023

•          *Time*: 1:00 p.m. - 2:30 p.m.

•          *Location*: Seminar Hall - AIML Department, 2nd Floor - A6
Building, CSPIT, FTE, CHARUSAT


*Please confirm your presence using the link below:*

Registration Link <https://forms.gle/BqJvdeNwts9ikxzx7>

Thank you.
-- 

*Martin K Parmar,*

At. & Post Changa-388421, Ta: Petlad, Dist:Anand, (Gujarat) India.

subject: info
snippet: Dear FIRST YEAR Students of Charusat Students, We hope this email finds you well and excited about your academic journey at Charusat Students . We are reaching out to inform you about an incredible
content:
*Dear FIRST YEAR Students of  Charusat Students,*

We hope this email finds you well and excited about your academic journey
at   *Charusat Students*  . We are reaching out to inform you about an
incredible opportunity that will kickstart your career and help you develop
essential skills in partnership with Teachnook*, IIT Bhubaneswar
Wissenaire, and IIT Bombay E-Cell.*

We are pleased to announce the Upskilling Career Program, a two-month
intensive training program designed exclusively for a limited number of
students like you. This program is focused on providing industry-specific
skills and knowledge to enhance your professional development and prepare
you for a successful career.

*By joining the Upskilling Career Program,*



*Get the Chance to do an amazing project Certificates from IIT Bhubaneswar
Wissenaire Professional mentorship to kickstart your career *


*To provide you with a preview of the program and facilitate communication
among participants, we have created a dedicated Whatsapp group exclusively
for first-year students. Joining this group will allow you to connect with
like-minded individuals, interact with professionals, and stay updated on
program-related information.*
To join the Upskilling Career Program Whatsapp group, simply click on the
following link:


*  STUDENTS CAN FILL OUT THE FORM TO GET REGISTER:*
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfKhnvK7X5sAxhXXssXi-HonxNtRrp58Bj_adjnEkLFOoBomw/viewform?usp=sf_link


Please note that participation in the Whatsapp group is optional but highly
encouraged as it will enrich your learning experience and provide you with
a supportive community.

We are excited to have you as a part of this program and look forward to
helping you unlock your full potential and achieve your career goals.

[FINAL CALL]


*Limited Slots AvailableDon't miss out on this chance to supercharge your
career! Secure your spot in the Upskilling Career Program and gain an edge
in the competitive world. Act now and register via the provided link to
embark on a journey of unparalleled growth and learning.*
*NOTE: **For those who have successfully registered for the program, kindly
disregard this message*


Best regards,
Teachnook
IIT BHUBANESWAR WISSENAIRE
